summary: The Neighbors Not Enemies Act, introduced in the House of Representatives on January 22, 2025, aims to repeal the Alien Enemies Act (Sections 4067-4070 of the Revised Statutes of the United States, 50 U.S.C. 21–24). The bill seeks to remove legal provisions concerning the treatment of alien enemies, impacting national security and potentially reshaping how the U.S. government interacts with non-citizens during times of conflict or perceived threat.
